basics.name: Gino Suarez
basics.label: Certified Oracle APEX Developer
basics.summary: As an Oracle APEX Developer, I specialize in transforming ideas into fully functional, data-driven applications. My current focus is on Oracle APEX, PL/SQL, and JavaScript, building dynamic, scalable applications for businesses worldwide. With over 16 years of experience in IT and 6+ in APEX , including working remotely with global teams, I am adept at integrating APEX with modern web technologies and delivering solutions that drive business success.

work.name: Insum Solutions
work.summary: As an Application Engineer at Insum, I design and develop Oracle APEX applications that meet clients' business needs. I work closely with stakeholders to turn requirements into scalable solutions, using Oracle APEX, PL/SQL, and JavaScript. My role includes optimizing database performance, integrating systems, and delivering efficient, user-friendly applications that streamline processes and enhance operations.

work.name: Estilos
work.summary: At Estilos, I progressed from Developer to Database Administrator, eventually becoming Head of Software Development. In these roles, I provided technical leadership, optimized database performance, and led a team to enhance and support the ERP system. I collaborated with stakeholders to define system requirements and develop solutions that streamlined back-office operations, aligning with business goals.

work.name: College of Architects of Lima
work.summary: At CAP Lima, I contributed to the development and migration of systems to .NET technologies, while also supporting legacy applications. My responsibilities included implementing new features, resolving bugs, and ensuring a smooth transition to modern platforms, all while maintaining and enhancing existing systems.

work.name: CSI
work.summary: At CSI, I was involved in the development of multiple products, where I designed and developed features that aligned with bussiness needs. I utilized a range of technologies, from relational databases to distributed frameworks, ensuring robust and effective solutions that enhanced product functionality.

work.name: Autodema
work.summary: I supported legacy applications, developed the institution's first website, and facilitated the integration of local systems with new technologies and government-implemented applications, ensuring seamless functionality and enhanced service delivery.
